title: The Reckless Bride
description: Four bold, brave, and determined ex-officers of the Crown band together to destroy the traitorous fiend known as the Black Cobra.He races to complete their mission against escalating odds -- his task made more perilous when he loses his heart.She's determined to defy convention and live a solitary life -- until she tastes the reckless pleasure found only in his arms.Drawn together by fate, united by fiery passion, they pursue their shared destiny...one they'll live to see only if they unmask the Black Cobra.
author: Stephanie Laurens
